body:
Me and my cousin are going to be streaming Call Of Duty: Black Ops 3. Link:

twitch.tv/shrederboy562

Some people showing up would be nice, he loves when people talk in the chat.

We're going up in less than 5, I'll edit when we're live.

Edit: We are live. Playing AW instead because of download times.
